GR13cakbhavu:7: iha hi niruttaranirniketanāvaṭaviṭaṅkasaṃkalitasakalakalanākulaṃ paramabhairavacakreśvarasatatattvam avācyavācakam avarṇanirvarṇanam anādyanantam antarbahīrūpam apūjyapūjakam api prasaradādyodyantṛtāvatārakramāvatāritapañcavāhaprapañcamayākṛtrimapūjyapūjanakakrameṇa protsphurati iti rītir avigītasukhasaṃpradāyasaraṇisamanugatasarvāgamāntaraghumaghumāyamānaśrīvijñānabhairavādiṣu svakaṇṭhenaivabhagavatā nirṇītā, śrīsvatantrabhaṭṭārakādiṣu ca
GR13cakbhavu:9: ityādivākyair dhvanitā mānasayāgātirekiṇī sarvabhāvopahṛtiḥ, tām eva bhaṭṭārakapādāḥ stotramukhena prakaṭayanta ādiślokena āsūtrayanti
GR13cakbhavu:14: caturthyantapadāveditatatsvarūpasarvāvedananayena unmanībhāvaḥ tatsamāviṣṭena sūcitaḥ, tena tatra mano vilāpayāmīty arthaḥ /
GR13cakbhavu:15: kāladehaṃ vā kālavikalpanollāsikāmīhaṃ vā sūryakalājālena dvādaśātmakamarīcicayena yo 'paharatīti tacchīlo 'yam akramapadena darśitaḥ, sūrīnāmakalājālena madhyamadhāmānuvedhena bhāvābhāvabhūmyullaṅghanātmanā kāladehāpahārī mahāhaṅkārātmakamahākāladeham apahartuṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GR13cakbhavu:19: tataś ca sūryakalājālena vā sūryakalājālam eva vā kāladeham apaharatīty alaṃgrāsamahaughaḥ prakaṭitaḥ, na hy akramānākhyaparaciccakreśvarīsamudaye kālo nāma kaścid upapadyate /
GR13cakbhavu:21: Q: kālaḥ kālena kālyaś cet & kālaḥ kālyeta kena vā akālya eva kālaś cet & kālya eva tathāḷna kim mṛtyuḥ sphuratprakāśāntar&nigīrṇo nigiret katham asphurann aprakāśatvān & nāntargrāhyo 'thavā na kim
GR13cakbhavu:24: udyogāvabhāsacarvaṇavilāpanataduttarakṛtyayogāt pīṭha iva pīṭho yasya \pratika{ādhārādhyeyapīṭhāya} iti tu pāṭhe ādhāre dhyeyā śaktir eva tadadhiṣṭhānena sādhiṣṭhānatvāt pīṭho yasya tasmai bhavāya, abhavadāyine
GR13cakbhavu:25: 'śivaparikhaṇḍanāya mokṣapradāya vā nama ity anena kāladehāpahāriṇādhārādheyapīṭhatvapratipādanena sarvātmasātkaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ satatodito 'kṛtrimapūjānaya uṭṭaṅkitaḥ /
GR13cakbhavu:27: pīṭhapadena sthitikramah, bhavapadena sṛṣṭiḥ, ity akramaughaḥ sṛṣṭiparyavasānenānena ślokena carcitaḥ /
GR13cakbhavu:33: Viv: avyaktā bhavābhavasthitiprādhānyād uṭṭaṅkatvenāprakaṭitā mūrtir yasya tasmai śivāya mahatyāveśe 'py aparibhraṃśaśīlāya /
GR13cakbhavu:35: śiśutayādyā bhedasvabhāvena sthitā yeyaṃ niśākāntasya kālarātrīramaṇasya parabhairavasya kalanāt
GR13cakbhavu:36: saivāghoraghorāghorātighorāvaraṇatrayopetavargāṣṭakadalalālitā, saiva kamalaṃ tanmāline tadādhārāya tadādheyāya vā /
GR13cakbhavu:40: Q: kṛśatayā kraśimavyapalāpinī & jayati kāpi kalā vigatakramā iti /
GR13cakbhavu:43: Q: krīḍaty ātmamayair bhāvair & bālaḥ krīḍanakair iva //
GR13cakbhavu:48: \pratika{ānandadehāya} iti sṛṣṭis tasyā ānandarūpatvāt, \pratika{avyaktamūrtaye} iti saṃhāraḥ
GR13cakbhavu:51: CakBhst_3ab: namaḥ pāśaughasaṃghaṭṭalayaviśleṣakāriṇe CakBhst_3cd: mantragarbhodarasthāya harāya paramātmane
GR13cakbhavu:52: Viv: pāśānām -- āṇavamāyīyakārmikāṇām malānām oghaḥ tasya saṃghaṭṭa ahetukena kenāpi krameṇa ullāsaḥ, tena vā tatra vā tasya vā yo 'yaṃ layaḥ,
GR13cakbhavu:53: tathā viśleṣaḥ pṛthagbhāvas tatkaraṇaśīlatvena vartamānāya sadā tritayakāritvān nāntarīyakaṃ tirodhānānugrahakāritvaṃ dhvanitam /
GR13cakbhavu:54: \pratika{mantragarbhodarasthāya} ity atra tridhā gurvāmnāyaḥ -- mantrā varṇarūpā garbhe yasyāḥ sā mālinī mantragarbhā tadantargatā tasyā udare vācyatvenābhyantare tiṣṭhatīti sa tathā, athavā mantrāṇāṃ garbho
GR13cakbhavu:55: mantragarbhaḥ prathamasvaras tasyodaram uttarapakṣapratikṣepeṇa madhyamakalā tuṭyardharūpā tatra sthitā, athavā mananatrāṇadharmitvān marīciṣu sthityuditāsu mantra ityādirūpatayā yo 'yam anārāvarāvo rāvasaṃghaṭṭakatayā
GR13cakbhavu:59: ityādyasmadviracitākulakaulikātriṃśikoktasvarūpas tasya garbhaṃ gahanam avaṭarūpaṃ tadudare tadgamanikāgamye dhāmni tiṣṭhatīti sa tathoktaḥ,
GR13cakbhavu:60: sarvatra cātrādyabhaṭṭārakopadeśa eva virājate tasyaiva paramātmatvāt, ata evātra bhavaśivaharaśabdaiḥ
GR13cakbhavu:63: haraśabdena saṃhārasya dyotane 'kṛtakā kāpi pūjā nirūpitaiva //3
GR13cakbhavu:65: śambhor nirguṇasyānantaguṇasya vopacārair anantair bāhyair vā kāyikair vācikair mānasair vā pūjayitum aśakyatvāt ko 'yaṃ bhāvopahāro nāma ity
GR13cakbhavu:67: CakBhst_4ab: yadyapi tvaṃ guṇātīto vākpater apy agocaraḥ
GR13cakbhavu:68: CakBhst_4cd: tathāpy ā hṛdayāt stotum udyatā vāk sadā mama CakBhst_5ab: atibhaktirasāveśavivaśā viśvatomukha CakBhst_5cd: tvatpreritā yato nātha nāparādho 'sti me kvacit
GR13cakbhavu:69: Viv: yadyapitathāpiśabdābhyām anupapattāv apy upapattiṃ prakāśayadbhyām anupapattir eva sarvopapattir iti kāpi yuktir uktā, tathā hi guṇātīto 'pi
GR13cakbhavu:70: tasyaiva viṣayo 'pi tadullāsitena kenāpi durghaṭaghaṭanānayenārvācīnabhūmimūrtitvena viṣayadhāma aśnute /
GR13cakbhavu:72: Q: parataratayāpi rūpaṃ & yad yat kalayāmi tat tad adharaṃ te
GR13cakbhavu:73: Q: adharatarāpi na kalanā & sā kācid yatra na sthitāsy abhitaḥ /iti
GR13cakbhavu:74: ā hṛdayād ā paradhāmnaḥ paśyantyādirūpeṇa sadoditāpi vaikharyātmanā tvayaivaitenādyabhaṭṭārakena prakarṣeṇeritā satī prasarati, iti mam na kaś caid aparādha ity ahaṃ tatsamāveśita evoditaḥ, yady ahaṃ nāma kaś cid anyo
GR13cakbhavu:75: bhaveyaṃ, bhaven nāma aparādho, yadi param aparādho 'py aham api bhavān
GR13cakbhavu:76: apy ekam eva tattvaṃ, tataś ca ko 'parādhaśabdārthaḥ /
GR13cakbhavu:79: Q: candravimalamukuṭena nutāv & anumoditā mama matiḥ pravartate /
GR13cakbhavu:80: iti atikrāntā bhaktirasāvibhāgabhūmir yena tādṛg yo 'yam āveśaḥ sarvatodikkatanmayatodayas tena vivaśā viśiṣṭā vaśeva kareṇur iva nijabodharasacarvaṇasadāvaraṇanirāvaraṇamadavighūrṇitatvād viśvataḥ sarvato mukhāni yasya sa tathā, ity anenaitad uktaṃ bhavati---na tad vācyaṃ kṛtyaṃ vā kiṃcana yat tvatparicarvaṇacārurūpatayā na cakāsti /
GR13cakbhavu:81: tataś ca suptapralāpagālidānādibhir api tvam eva stūyase ity āha viśvato mukha iti visvata ā mukhaṃ yasyeti vā /
GR13cakbhavu:85: CakBhst_6cd: gṛhāṇa mattaḥ śrīkaṇṭha ! bhāvapūjām akṛtrimām
GR13cakbhavu:86: Viv: śrīr viśvavaicitryaśobhodhāvinī śaktiḥ kaṇṭhe 'vibhāgadhāmni yasya
GR13cakbhavu:87: tasyāmantraṇaṃ, `gṛhāṇa' iti saṃpradānasaṃpradeyatayā tvam eva sphurasīti yāñcārthā akṛtktrimaśabdena sūcitā /
GR13cakbhavu:90: rañjanād rajas tena pūtā tato vā pūtā sadyuktiparipavanena kṣapitā yā citābhūtiḥ sarvasaṃkṣayaparacidrūpā sarvodbhūtirūpā vā tayā viśiṣṭāyāṃ bhuvy uṣitāt prastoṣyamāṇān matto mama sakāśāt tvam api matto nijānandanirbharo bhāvapūjām ātasātkaroṣīti //6//
GR13cakbhavu:94: Viv: hṛtpuṣkaraṃ hṛtpadmaṃ tatra baddhalakṣyatayā snātvā sakalamalavidhūnananaṃ vidhāya, athavā haratīti hṛt saṃhārasaṃhāriṇīrūpam,
GR13cakbhavu:95: etad eva hṛtpuṣkaraṃ tīrthaṃ sarvacakrāṇāṃ tatraiva paramaviśrāntilābhāt,
GR13cakbhavu:96: tatra sarvaviśuddhim ādāya yogino 'tra pararaśmirūpāḥ, samyag bodhaḥ saṃbodhas tad eva dhautaṃ sakalakālikāviśuddhaṃ vasanam aśeṣācchādakatayā vartamānam yasya, iti sarvottīrṇasarvamayatoktiḥ, śyāmakaṇṭhaḥ sarvaghaṭṭakamahātamisrārūpasaṃkalanadhāmātmikā śyāmā kaṇṭhe gale yasya /
GR13cakbhavu:99: Q: pralayotsavasarabhasayā & dṛḍham upagūḍhaṃ śivaṃ vande [Utp. Stotrāvalī
GR13cakbhavu:102: CakBhst_8ab: prabhūtabhūtasaṃbhūtaśoṇitair arghabhājanam CakBhst_8cd: kriyate te mahākālakāyakaṃkālakandale
GR13cakbhavu:103: Viv: prabhau vyāpake bhairavadhāmny ūtāny anusyūtāni yāni bhūtāni pañcātmakaśaktivivartabhūtāni pṛthivyādīni, tatra saṃbhūtāni yāni śoṇitāni
GR13cakbhavu:104: tatsvarūpavigalanasamuditacidrasarūpāṇi, tair arghabhājanaṃ mahāvimarśamayapūjanapātram ekaśaktiśuktivigalanarūpaṃ sarveṣām
GR13cakbhavu:107: CakBhst_9cd: tat tad dvārādhipakulaṃ tava pūjyaṃ manasvibhiḥ
GR13cakbhavu:108: Viv: bāhyaviṣayākṣepakatvān manonmanālakṣaṇaṃ dvāraṃ tadvāsi kulaṃ dvāḥsthakulaṃ dvāḥsthasamūhaḥ, vikalparasā eva hi
GR13cakbhavu:109: svarūparasāveśadravaṇenāsamvibhaktā bāhyakaṣyāsu kṣipanti, tad anu caivaṃ
GR13cakbhavu:110: mānitās te svarūpanarapatisamīpam arpayanti, iti svaśaktibhāgāvadhānena pūjyaṃ svīkṛtamanaskaiḥ
GR13cakbhavu:113: Viv: camanād abāhyatvenāntar eva cimicimāyamānatvāt, dravaṇāc ca bahirlokayātrātmanā prasaraṇāt, tathā suṣṭhu ūraṇād iti candraśabdena sūryaśabdena ca jāgratsvapnayor grahaṇam, tayor grahaṇe ātmasātkaraṇe
GR13cakbhavu:114: sati, aśeṣāvaraṇaiḥ sarvopādhibhiḥ, unmukte guuptasauṣuptamaṇḍale guptaṃ
GR13cakbhavu:115: tirohitaṃ sauṣuptaṃ maṇḍalaṃ yatra tasmin turīye dhāmni, nagajā avicalakūṭasthadhāmasamullasitā śaktiḥ tasyāḥ kānta viśrāntadhāman,
GR13cakbhavu:120: mātṛmānameyollaṅghanena pramitimātraṃ nirviśeṣeṇa phalarūpam āsanam upalakṣaṇatayā tasyāpi sāpekṣatvāt tad apy ullaṅghitavato 'vyapadeśyasya
GR13cakbhavu:121: tava, te nivedyata iti pāṭhe nivedyate niḥśeṣeṇa vedyate
GR13cakbhavu:124: CakBhst_12ab: mūrtidānam anābhāsaśaktibhāsopabṛṃhitam CakBhst_12cd: turyapīṭhapratiṣṭhānaṃ vitarāmi jagatpate
GR13cakbhavu:126: avachinnacamatkārasāraśaktyavabhāsarūpaṃ, mūrter mūrcchitasatattvasya kiṃciducchūnatātmanaḥ pāripūrṇyollekhasya dānaṃ, vitarāmi vimṛśāmi,
GR13cakbhavu:129: CakBhst_13cd: kaḥ karoti budhaḥ sthāṇor āhvānādivisarjanam
GR13cakbhavu:130: Viv: sthāṇor sthāsnor apracalitasarvagatacinmātravapuṣaḥ pṛthag digdeśakālaparigaṇanakalpanābhāvād āhvānopakramaṃ visarjanam avagatatattvah kaḥ karoti, vyatiriktadeśakālasaṃbhave hi kasya cid ānayanaṃ kutra cit prahāṇaṃ saṃbhāvyeta, iha tu sarvasyaiva tanmayatvāt kasyāhvānaṃ kuta āhvānaṃ, kasya visarjanaṃ kutra ca visarjanam iti
GR13cakbhavu:134: Viv: abhyajyate 'nabhivyaktam aoi vyaktim ānīyate sṛṣṭikramāvadyotitā yena so 'bhaṅga upasnehakaḥ, netre prathamasūtre 'pi //14//
GR13cakbhavu:136: CakBhst_15cd: niḥsnehatvaṃ prabhutvaṃ ca rūkṣam udvartanaṃ tava
GR13cakbhavu:137: Viv: indriyārtheṣu śabdasparśarūparasagandheṣu viṣayabhūteṣu, indriyeṣu rāgalobhānuyāyiṣu satsv iti vyadhikaraṇe saptamyau, niḥsnehatvaṃ prabhutvaṃ cātyantāyuktir anabhiṣvaṅgas tadadhiṣṭhātṛtvena vā sphuraṇam
GR13cakbhavu:138: Q: buddhavat sarvarāgī syāt & sarvadveṣyo 'tha bhairavaḥ iti nyāyenodvartanam aśeṣavāsanonmūlanam
GR13cakbhavu:142: ṣoḍaśasvararūpakalākalāpārambhādyavarṇarūpaśiroṅkuśarūpayā+ anacchakalayā baindhavaṃ tīrtham ubhayaśūnyabilarūpaṃ saṃśodhya nirgranthibandhaṃ
GR13cakbhavu:146: Viv: svaprabodhaḥ svavimarśa eva+ ambaram anāvaraṇatvād vyoma ata evodāram udbhaṭaṃ vikasat sarvātmatayā prasarat sollāsitakāryācchādakatayā vastraṃ
GR13cakbhavu:147: tena gharṣaṇaṃ pratyāvṛttinayena svāvadhānaṃ vidhāya, prāpte
GR13cakbhavu:148: mahāsāmarasye, vigaliteṣu dvaitodayamahāsaṃtrāsaḍambhareṣv akhaṇḍitasvāvabodhanirmatsarabalīn sarvatodikkaṃ kṣipāmaḥ //17//
GR13cakbhavu:150: CakBhst_18cd: paramānandadaṃ me 'ntas tava pādyam anābilam
GR13cakbhavu:151: Viv: ubhayor api sāpekṣatvenānupapadyamānasvarūpatvāj jaḍājaḍayos triṣv api kāleṣu cidatirekeṇābhāva evāgamanād avicalatvān nagaḥ tatra yo nirjharo nirgato jharo vayohānirūpaḥ kālo yasmāt tādṛksvarūpaṃ tataḥ pravṛttaṃ paracamatkārarūpaṃ pādyaṃ
GR13cakbhavu:158: akramaprakaṭitanimeṣonmeṣasrṣṭisthitiprakāram īṣaducchūnatayā kiṃciccalanātmakam api tad eva mandiraṃ sarvasya prathamanivāsitvād amando 'navacchinna ānandaniḥṣyando 'ham ity ullekhacamatkāraprasaro yatra
GR13cakbhavu:159: tādṛśaspandamandirasya kandarād agādhād dhāmnaḥ, unmiṣadananyatvarasarūpam ācamanaṃ gṛhāṇa kaivalyarasam api saṃhara, iti ko 'pi bandhamokṣottīrṇo naya unmīlitaḥ, ``mandarakandarāt'' iti vā pāṭhaḥ //19//
GR13cakbhavu:161: CakBhst_20cd: anarghyam arghaṃ pādebhyaḥ prayacchāmi vṛṣākape
GR13cakbhavu:162: Viv: he vṛṣa svaśaktirasavarṣanapravaṇa! tathā+ akape acapala---kūṭastha!
GR13cakbhavu:164: manograthanād dhāraṇā vāruṇyādyā deśabandharūpāś cittasya tā evāmbhāsi tair aṣṭottaraśatasaṃkhyātāntikamukhyasaṃpradāyasiddhibhūmikolaṅghanakrameṇa+
GR13cakbhavu:167: CakBhst_21cd: girīśa tisṛbhir vāgbhiḥ stutipuṣpaiḥ prapūjyase
GR13cakbhavu:168: Viv: giri vāgviṣaye īśa svāmin, turīyodyāne parāsvarūpakānane vikasad yad etat saṃvitsaurabhaṃ bodhāmodas tannirbharaiḥ, stutirūpaiḥ puṣpaiḥ,
GR13cakbhavu:172: 'py aviluptasvāvabhāsas tava stavastabakaḥ, vaikharyās tu maukharyeṇa
GR13cakbhavu:174: sarvatodikkaprathitaparameśvararūpātirekivācyāntaravirahāt satatam eva tadanuśaṃsaiva kusumitā mitābhidhānanirṇayanirdalanatātparyaparyavasitā ityuktaṃ bhavati //21//
GR13cakbhavu:177: Viv: prāṇoddīpitā yeyaṃ vahniśikhā---āgneyadhāmakoṭiḥ, saiva astāt trāyate
GR13cakbhavu:178: iti astraṃ, atha vā niṣkalanātho 'tra udvṛttaḥ, tenaiva hikkāpātoddīpitena granthibhedanakrameṇa brahmagranthibhedāt, tatra prāṇo ``ha''
GR13cakbhavu:179: vahniśikhārūpam astram ityādi, sarvaprameyajātaṃ dhūpayati sarvaṃ
GR13cakbhavu:181: CakBhst_23ab: anāhatā nadaty antar yā gaur dhāmni pare parā CakBhst_23cd: sā ghaṇṭā vādyate śambhor agre granthārthagarbhiṇī
GR13cakbhavu:182: Viv: aghaṃṭasiditi troṭayati iti aghaṇṭā parā prakṛṣṭā
GR13cakbhavu:184: CakBhst_24ab: kandānalollasacchaktiśikhāṃ dīpaśikhopamām CakBhst_24cd: uddīpayāmi bhagavan
GR13cakbhavu:185: Viv: kandānalāt ādhāramadhyadhāmnaḥ ullasantī śaktiśikhā bindurūpā, tāṃ śāktasphāroddīpanāt dīparūpāṃ nādasūciśekharamudrānupraveśena uddīpayāmi //24//
GR13cakbhavu:186: CakBhst_25ab: vṛttityāgāmṛtakalācandraś candrakirīṭinaḥ CakBhst_25cd: samālambhanavevāstu mumukṣūṇāṃ vimuktaye
GR13cakbhavu:188: pramāṇaviparyayavikalpanidrāsmṛtivṛttiprahāṇapariśiṣṭatadanuprāṇakāvināśabodhaghanasārarūpaṃ samyag ālambhanaṃ samālambhanaṃ, sarvācchuraṇāt samālambhakaṃ vā tādṛśā eva hi mumukṣavo mucyante iti /
GR13cakbhavu:190: Q: yo 'vikalpam idam arthamaṇḍalaṃ & paśyatīśa nikhilaṃ bhavadvapuḥ /
GR13cakbhavu:191: Q: svātmapakṣaparipūrite jagaty & asya nityasukhinaḥ kuto bhayam // iti
GR13cakbhavu:193: CakBhst_26cd: uṣṇīṣam astu te rudra vidrāvitanabho 'rgalam
GR13cakbhavu:194: Viv: nādaśakter bindūrdhvakalāyā uditam uparigataṃ nādāntatejovyapadeśyaṃ prakāśakatvād dhāma, tad eva avacchedahetunā āṇavādinā malatrayeṇa virahitam, tathā vidrāvitanabho 'rgalaṃ
GR13cakbhavu:204: candrakalā, taveti candrakamalamīlananayaḥ ko 'pi gurumukharahasyakrama uddīpitaḥ //29//
GR13cakbhavu:210: Q: paramāṇuvatprahīṇaṃ & yatra nabhas tan numaḥ śaivam iti śaktair arkakarair mahākālasaṃkarṣiṇīkiraṇaiś cidrūpacandrapīyūṣarasacarvaṇena cinnabhaso 'pi u .........(lacuna).......
GR13cakbhavu:212: CakBhst_30ab: mantraṃ manasi tacchaktau tāṃ svadhāmni sadodite
GR13cakbhavu:213: CakBhst_30cd: kṛtvā japavidhiṃ samyak śivāya vinivedaye
GR13cakbhavu:214: Viv: ``sahasro mānasa'' iti nītyā mantram anāhatasatatoccarad akulabhaṭṭārakākāram
GR13cakbhavu:216: Q: antarjalacarāḥ satvās te 'pi nityaṃ bruvanti tam
GR13cakbhavu:217: iti prāṇātmikakalāṃśāṃśikāsthitasamastatithiviṣuvadayanaparigamapūrapūritāśeṣajapaphalam ekoccāraviprasṛtākṣamālākṣamāloparigatādyantakarmaspandameruparyāvṛttidarśitasṛṣṭisaṃhāraṃ manasy avadhānamaye kṛtvā, tad api manaḥ prāptamantrasāmarasyaṃ śaktau prathanaprathamavīrye kṛtvā, śaktim api nijamahimani nityam aparityaktasārvātmyasarvottīrṇatātirekamahodaye sarvavarṇānāṃ
GR13cakbhavu:220: Q: tad ākramya balaṃ mantrāḥ iti /
GR13cakbhavu:221: evaṃvidhaṃ japamakaraṇakaraṇena nirvartya, śivāya svātmamaheśvare tādarthyena viśeṣeṇa niravaśeṣaṃ buddhye samyak,
GR13cakbhavu:222: ityevaṃvidhamahāvīryasphārasāmarasyamayasatatoditajapāvadhānātirekeṇa paśūnāṃ japa uccaritapradhvaṃsivarṇanirvartyaḥ, etat paramārthatāyām api
GR13cakbhavu:223: nirvīryabījatayā na samyaksiddhisādhanabhāvam aśnuta ity uktaṃ bhavati
GR13cakbhavu:225: CakBhst_31cd: anābilaṃ parāṃ vyāptiṃ mudrāṃ badhnāmi dhūrjaṭe
GR13cakbhavu:226: Viv: dhunoti sarvaṃ, raṃhati sarvatra, janayati sarvaṃ, ṭīkate sarvatra iti āgūritākramacatuṣṭayārtho dhūrjaṭiḥ /
GR13cakbhavu:227: etāṃ layodayamudrām ekām api pañcadhā vakṣyamāṇanayena sphurantīṃ badhnāmy ātmasātkaromi /
GR13cakbhavu:228: akhilārthaparihāre vā svīkāre vā askhalanāt aparicchinnamahiman?
GR13cakbhavu:234: paravyomni vyāptyunmimiṣāsaṃjihīrṣātmakollāsopaśamasîdhyaiva khe caratīti khecarī ity etallakṣaṇalakṣitatayaiva sarvamudrîṇîm iyam ekaiva pañcadhî
GR13cakbhavu:236: CakBhst_32ab: śaṣkulīkarṇayor baddhvā yo rāvo 'tra vijṛmbhate
GR13cakbhavu:237: CakBhst_32cd: tadgītam atha te vādyam ādyasaṃpuṭaghaṭṭanāt
GR13cakbhavu:238: Viv: śrotrapuṭikayor yo 'ntarninadann iva sāmānyasvarūpo yo 'sau, gītaṃ sa eva, ādyakandobhayapakṣasaṃkocāt nānānāḍīveṇuvane vicarann
GR13cakbhavu:242: gopya iti pāṭhe bhagavata āmantraṇaṃ svaprakāsatvās ananyaprakāsya! ityarthaḥ, śaṣkulīkarṇayor ādyasaṃpuṭaghaṭṭanād yo rāvas tad gītam iti anvīyate //32//
GR13cakbhavu:243: CakBhst_33ab: bhavadbhāvarasāveśāt tāṇḍavāḍambaroddhataḥ CakBhst_33cd: mantrādhvani nadāmy antaḥ kim u bāhyārthabhāvanaiḥ
GR13cakbhavu:244: Viv: tvanmayotkarṣeṣu śṛṅgārādiṣv api raseṣv āveśāt tvadanukārivikīrṇanijamarīcimayakarakalpitasaṃkīrṇāsaṃkīrṇapatākādisamudbodhitabhāvavaibhavābhinayo bhavābhavodghaṭṭanavighaṭṭanajavanikāprāveśanirgamanākampitasvarūpo 'pi
GR13cakbhavu:245: nṛttam ārabhe, tad uktaṃ mayā śivarātrivicāravārtike
GR13cakbhavu:250: mantrādhvani dhvanidhāmani guptabhāṣaṇapravaṇapaśyantīpade, yad vā vācyavācakādhvaṣaṭkamadhyavartipañcamantramahimani, nadāmi cidbhairavaikaghanatāpramodena garjāmi /
GR13cakbhavu:251: kiṃ varākair bāhyaviṣayavikalpātaṅkaiḥ, iti pararasaparitṛptimahodgāraṃ prakaṭayati
GR13cakbhavu:252: ``na māmy antaḥ kim u bāhye 'tra bhauvane'' iti vā pāṭhaḥ, tatra na māmi
GR13cakbhavu:253: na varte kim u bhauvane kalādāv akalānte bhuvanādhvanītyarthaḥ //33//
GR13cakbhavu:255: CakBhst_34cd: upariṣṭān mayā śambhor vitānam upakalpitam
GR13cakbhavu:256: Viv: vitanoti sarvaṃ vitanyate vā sarvatra iti vitānam //34//
GR13cakbhavu:258: CakBhst_35cd: dhāryate dhūrjaṭer agre cārucāmaravan mayā
GR13cakbhavu:262: CakBhst_36cd: tālavṛntair iva vibho vījyase haṃsamārutaiḥ
GR13cakbhavu:263: Viv: visṛtaiḥ praviṣṭaiḥ, prasṛtaiḥ, haṃsamārutaiḥ prāṇapavanais tāluvṛntair ivotkṣepakatulyaiḥ
GR13cakbhavu:265: CakBhst_37cd: ātapatram athāsmābhir & dhāryate te mahāśaya
GR13cakbhavu:269: Viv: bhavanirāvaraṇavijayayātropakrame niyatāhantāmamatāparikṣaye pūrṇāhantātmako 'haṅkāro hayas tvadativahanāya //38//
GR13cakbhavu:273: nijabodhānandanandanodyānapraphullo, nāgaḥ śarīraḥ pavanaviśeṣas tasya vallī prathamaprāṇodbhedaśaktiḥ
GR13cakbhavu:276: CakBhst_40cd: advaitāgnau juhomy antaḥ & śāṃkare sreyasām nidhau
GR13cakbhavu:280: Viv: aje sarvādisiddhe pūrvodite śivadhāmahavyabhuji grāhyagrāhakabhedavāsanendhanadahanasamedhite svarasavigalitapriyāpriyaphaladharmādharanibaddhavāsanāghṛtapūrṇāhutiṃ juhomy avimarśatadvirāmarūpasamanonmanāpāṇibhyāṃ
GR13cakbhavu:281: sūkṣmakaraṇaśaktitaduparamāṅgulipañcakopaśobhitābhyāṃ taduparivartanād ``unmanyante paraḥ śivaḥ'' iti dṛśā unmanāsrucaṃ parigṛhya pūrṇāṃ juhomi,
GR13cakbhavu:282: iti saṃkṣayapradhānāyām api vṛttāv aviluptam eva pāripūrṇyam---iti
GR13cakbhavu:285: Q: svānandatas tribhuvanaṃ kavalaṃ vidhāya & svātmānam apy atitarāṃ samadā grasantī Q: tṛptā tathāpy aparikhaṇḍitanityasiddha&svātantryapūrṇavibhavā
GR13cakbhavu:289: Viv: bāhyavyāvṛttivigamapūrvakam antarmananam anantatayā sphuraṇam antarmānaṃ tadvidhau, tvadanubhavaśaśiprakāśavivaśīkṛtaḥ, cittam eva cintāmaṇir bhavatsamāveśena tadvad eva saṃkalpamātreṇa sarvasamullāsāt
GR13cakbhavu:290: CakBhst_43ab: mokṣalakṣmīkarāmbhoja&pātre vinyasya saṃskṛtām CakBhst_43cd: nivedayāmi bhagavan & prāṇasarvasvadakṣiṇām
GR13cakbhavu:291: Viv: prāṇā eva teṣāṃ vā sarvasvam āṇavaṃ svarūpaṃ, tan
GR13cakbhavu:294: mokṣalakṣmyā bhavaunmukhyaparāvṛttāyāḥ saṃviddevyāḥ karāmbhasi paramavīciniḥṣyande jātaṃ yat pātram pātatrāṇātmakam aviluptam
GR13cakbhavu:296: tad evaṃ māyopakalpitatattadavacchedavicchedikramākramacakracāramahāsāmarasyasamāpattipratipādanena yad eva ``namaḥ sūryakalā'' ityādinā prakrāntaṃ tad eva paryavasitam //43//
GR13cakbhavu:297: CakBhst_44ab: saṃsāravāridheḥ santaḥ & paraṃ pāraṃ titīrṣavaḥ
GR13cakbhavu:299: Viv: śrayantv avadhānena sevantāṃ, bhāvapūjāmayaṃ taraṇḍakaṃ potam //44//
GR13cakbhavu:300: CakBhst_45ab: ittham īśānacaraṇa&nuter yat samupārjitam CakBhst_45cd: śreyas tena jagat kṛtsnaṃ & dveṣadoṣād vimucyatām
GR13cakbhavu:302: niyatadarśanāvagrahagrahasamudgatadarśanāntaranirbhartsanākhaṇḍanasamayalopāj jagad vimuktam astu, niyatadarśanahevākitā hi sarvodayaviśrāmabhūmibhūtaparatattvaparikhaṇḍanatvāmastvāt sarvasyaiva paraḥ prakāraḥ /
GR13cakbhavu:304: Q: māyeyaṃ bahurūpatām upagatā nānā yathā te vibho & vidyāpy evam anantabhedagahanā no cet kathaṃ syād idam /
GR13cakbhavu:305: Q: naiḥsvābhāvyagamena ke cana pare vaiviktyataḥ ke 'pi vā & sārvātmyena pare taduttaradṛśā muktāḥ pare sarvatah //
GR13cakbhavu:308: Q: yady atattvaparihārapūrvakaṃ & tattvam eṣi tad atattvam eva hi /
GR13cakbhavu:309: Q: yady atattvam atha tattvam eva vā & tattvam eva nanu tattvam īdṛśam //
GR13cakbhavu:314: Viv: viśvasya sākṣī viśvarūpo vāmantryate, mānāvamānayoḥ grahaṇāgrahaṇayor niṣprapañcaprapañcayor mamatayojjhitā cittavṛttir yasya tadyuktā vā tyaktā cittavṛttir yena, aṃhaḥ pāpaṃ haratīti, ahaṃkṛd eva vāṅghris tadyugam anāvaraṇajñānakriyārūpaṃ tasya pīṭhaṃ paramaśivarūpaṃ tatra nilīnamauleḥ praśāntakaraṇapañcakakañcukopacayaploṣapariśiṣṭena ākhilabhūtihetunā
GR13cakbhavu:315: avabodhabhūtivibhavena avaguṇṭhitā ācchāditās tanavo mitatayā sphurantaḥ sarvabhāvā yena, nuḥ aṇor yat kapālaṃ, kaṃ mahāsvātantryarūpam anavacchinnaṃ brahma pālayati gopayatīti nṛkapālaṃ karparaṃ tat pāṇau ekasmin udbubhūṣāmarīcilakṣaṇe mitatayā iyattayā tulitaṃ yasya sa tathoktaḥ //46//
GR13cakbhavu:317: CakBhst_47cd: cakre ciccakranāthasya & śambhor bhāvanutiṃ parām
GR13cakbhavu:318: Viv: ``nirastaśāstrārthavikalpajālā & devyāḥ śmaśāne karavīrakākhye'' iti dṛśā bhasmaśabdavyākhyānavarṇitasvarūpe mahāpāśupatodyāne, bhairavāṇāṃ paśūnāṃ patir akalitaciccakreśvarātmakas tadudyāne tadūrdhvayāne
GR13cakbhavu:319: sarvātiśāyini, viśramya ananyatayā pratiṣṭhāṃ prāpya, ata eva kaś cid
GR13cakbhavu:323: ityādinā rājānakotpaladevanirvarṇitasvarūpasya śambhoḥ śreyaḥprabhavasya bhāvena sarvabhāvaikyasamāpattisamāveśamayena nutiṃ parāṃ cakre, iti
GR13cakbhavu:328: stotre bhāvopahāre vivaraṇam akarod ramyadevo dvijanmā
